data.title: Recommend
data.p1: Did you like this application? Recommend it to a friend!

error.email_unique: This email is already registered and cannot be recommended.

questions_e_sims.r_1:
Sometimes known as electronic SIM cards, eSIM actually stands for embedded SIM. As the name suggests, this means that SIM functionality can now be integrated directly into the device, rather than a separate card needing to be inserted.

In case you have the eSIM capable phone or tablet, you can use an eSIM instead of the regular physical SIM card.
questions_e_sims.q_2: How to buy plan for eSIM?
questions_e_sims.r_2: You can select the data plan you need by entering an eSIM, then you can go to the Packages option
questions_e_sims.q_3: How do I add credit, top-up my eSIM?
questions_e_sims.r_3: You can add credit easily online at any time. You just have to recharge your account in the payments tab, you can recharge using PayPal or Stripe.
questions_e_sims.q_4: Which countries are covered with eSIM?
questions_e_sims.q_5: What services can I use in my eSIMs?
questions_e_sims.r_5: You can make calls, send messages, and use mobile data.
questions_e_sims.q_6: How do I activate the SIM card?
questions_e_sims.r_6:
The eSIM's are active from the moment you buy, if you need to manually activate, you can perform these steps

 1. Enters the sims tab.
 2. Go to Buy or Register Esim.
 3. You can register by ICCID or phone number.

If you have any problems you can contact us in the Support option (in the setup icon at the top right of the app)

other_questions.q_1: What will my phone number be?
other_questions.r_1: SIM cards come with a European number, starting with +372.
other_questions.q_2: Will VoyagerSim SIM card work in my telephone and/or tablet?
other_questions.r_2: Physical SIMs work for any unlocked device and fits all phones and tablets
other_questions.q_3: How do I activate a physical SIM?
other_questions.r_3:
Physical sims must be manually activated, you can perform these steps

 1. Enters sims tab.
 2. Go to Sort or Register Physical sim.
 3. You can register by ICCID or phone number.

If you have any problems you can contact us in the Support option (in the setup icon at the top right of the app)
other_questions.q_4: How to buy a data plan, messages or pins on my SIM?
other_questions.r_4: You can select the data plan you need by entering your SIM list, either physical or eSIM, then go to the option you need (activate a PIN to get minutes, look for the SMS option or the packages option you can get data with) and make the purchase.
other_questions.q_5: How can I recharge / add credit to my account?
other_questions.r_5: You can easily add credit online at any time. Just top up your account in the payments tab, you can top up using PayPal or Stripe.
other_questions.q_6: What services can I use on my physical SIMs?
other_questions.r_6: You can make calls, send messages, and use mobile data.

paypal.title: Pay with PayPal
paypal.p1: Payments by credit card Cost per transaction is 6% + 0.30 USD/EUR. For example, if pay USD 100 with a credit card, the rate would be USD 6.00 + 0.30 USD.

stripe.title: Pay with Stripe
stripe.p1: Direct credit card payments only supported with Stripe option. Cost per transacition is 3% + 0.30 USD/EUR. For example, if pay USD 100 with a credit card, the rate would be USD 3.00 + 0.30 USD.
